## Import Libraries
We need tidyverse and ... libraries for this project.
```{r Import Libraries, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Import Data
```{r}
data <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mwaskom/seaborn-data/master/penguins.csv")
```


```{r}
head(data)
```

## Clean Data
